00024 //----------------------------------------------------------
00025 GrTSGen::GrTSGen( const SVec3 *vertices, const SVec3 *normals, const SVec2 *uvs, unsigned int vertCount )
00026 : _vertices( vertices )
00027 , _normals( normals )
00028 , _triangles( 0 )
00029 , _uvs( uvs )
00030 , _vertCount( vertCount )
00031 , _triCount( vertCount / 3 )
00032 , _faceTangents( 0 )
00033 , _faceBinormals( 0 )
00034 {
00035         B_ASSERT( vertCount % 3 == 0 );
00036 
00038         BuildTriList();
00039 }
00040 
00041 //----------------------------------------------------------
00042 GrTSGen::~GrTSGen()
00043 {
00044         delete[] _faceTangents;
00045         delete[] _faceBinormals;
00046         delete[] _triangles;
00047 }

00054 //----------------------------------------------------------
00055 void
00056 GrTSGen::GenTS( SVec3 *tangents, SVec3 *binormals )
00057 {
00060         B_ASSERT( _faceTangents == 0 );
00061         B_ASSERT( _faceBinormals == 0 );
00062 
00064         _faceTangents = new MVec3[ _triCount ];
00065         _faceBinormals = new MVec3[ _triCount ];
00066         for ( unsigned int tri = 0; tri < _triCount; ++tri )
00067         {
00068                 const MVec3 vert0 = _vertices[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ 0 ] ];
00069                 const MVec3 vert1 = _vertices[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ 1 ] ];
00070                 const MVec3 vert2 = _vertices[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ 2 ] ];
00071                 const SVec2& uv0 = _uvs[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ 0 ] ];
00072                 const SVec2& uv1 = _uvs[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ 1 ] ];
00073                 const SVec2& uv2 = _uvs[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ 2 ] ];
00074 
00076                 MVec3 e0 = vert1 - vert0;
00077                 MVec3 e1 = vert2 - vert0;
00078 
00080                 if ( e0.Mag() > 0.00001f && e1.Mag() > 0.00001f && e0.Cross( e1 ).MagSqr() > 0.00001f )
00081                 {
00082                         float u0 = uv1.x - uv0.x;
00083                         float u1 = uv2.x - uv0.x;
00084                         float v0 = uv1.y - uv0.y;
00085                         float v1 = uv2.y - uv0.y;
00086 
00087                         MVec3 tangent = v1*e0 - v0*e1;  
00088                         MVec3 binormal = u0*e1 - u1*e0; 
00089                         float scale = u0*v1 - u1*v0;
00090                         if ( Abs( scale ) > 0.0001f )
00091                         {
00092                                 tangent /= MVec3( scale, scale, scale );
00093                                 binormal /= MVec3( scale, scale, scale );
00094                         }
00095                         else
00096                         {
00097                                 tangent = MVec3( 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
00098                                 binormal = MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
00099                         }
00100 
00101                         _faceTangents[ tri ] = tangent.Normalized();
00102                         _faceBinormals[ tri ] = binormal.Normalized();
00103                 }
00104                 else
00105                 {
00107                         _faceTangents[ tri ] = MVec3( 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
00108                         _faceBinormals[ tri ] = MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
00109                 }
00110         }
00115         for ( unsigned int tri = 0; tri < _triCount; ++tri )
00116         {
00118                 for ( unsigned int vert = 0; vert < 3; ++vert )
00119                 {
00121                         unsigned int matchCount = 1;
00122                         SVec3 curTangent = _faceTangents[ tri ];
00123                         SVec3 curBinormal = _faceBinormals[ tri ];
00124                         for ( unsigned int tri2 = 0; tri2 < _triCount; ++tri2 )
00125                         {
00127                                 if ( tri == tri2 )
00128                                         continue;
00129 
00130                                 for ( unsigned int vert2 = 0; vert2 < 3; ++vert2 )
00131                                 {
00132                                         if ( _vertices[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ vert ] ] == _vertices[ _triangles[ tri2 ].index[ vert2 ] ] &&
00133                                                 _normals[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ vert ] ] == _normals[ _triangles[ tri2 ].index[ vert2 ] ] &&
00134                                                 _uvs[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ vert ] ] == _uvs[ _triangles[ tri2 ].index[ vert2 ] ] )
00135                                         {
00137                                                 curTangent += _faceTangents[ tri2 ];
00138                                                 curBinormal += _faceBinormals[ tri2 ];
00139                                                 ++matchCount;
00140                                                 break;
00141                                         }
00142                                 }
00143                         }
00144 
00146                         if ( curTangent.MagSqr() < 0.00001f )
00147                         {
00149                                 curTangent = MVec3( 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
00150                         }
00151                         if ( curBinormal.MagSqr() < 0.00001f )
00152                         {
00154                                 curBinormal = MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
00155                         }
00156                         tangents[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ vert ] ] = MVec3( ( 1.0f / float( matchCount ) ) * curTangent ).Normalized();
00157                         binormals[ _triangles[ tri ].index[ vert ] ] = MVec3( ( 1.0f / float( matchCount ) ) * curBinormal ).Normalized();
00158                 }
00159         }
00160 }

00167 //----------------------------------------------------------
00168 void
00169 GrTSGen::BuildTriList()
00170 {
00172         _triangles = new STriInfo[ _triCount ]; 
00173 
00175         B_ASSERT( ( _triCount * 3 ) == _vertCount );
00176         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _triCount; ++i )
00177         {
00178                 _triangles[ i ].index[ 0 ] = i * 3;
00179                 _triangles[ i ].index[ 1 ] = i * 3 + 1;
00180                 _triangles[ i ].index[ 2 ] = i * 3 + 2;
00181         }
00182 }
